item.def:
Enjoy a relaxing day at Jasmine Spa and receive the best treatment for your body, mind and soul. Jasmine Spa offers a wide variety of services which you will enjoy and experience the best spa therapy.
Jasmine Spa Sokha Angkor Resort offers 16 private treatment rooms with attractive decoration and private space.
